channel.title: Activities on Robotics Club
channel.description: Recent content in Activities on Robotics Club

item.title: Vishwakarma Puja
item.description: A glimpse of the vibrant Vishwakarma Puja celebration at our Robotics Club, Purwanchal Campus!

item.title: Completion of 7-Days Workshop on Robotics & Automation
item.description: It’s been an incredible journey of growth, learning, and collaboration. We are immensely proud of the dedication and hard work our team has demonstrated throughout this process.

item.title: Basic Robotics Workshop
item.description: Happy and satisfied faces after successfully making their first Bluetooth Controlled Bot on Day 5 of Basic Robotics Training (7 days Workshop).

item.title: Orientation Program
item.description: It’s been an incredible journey of growth, learning, and collaboration. We are immensely proud of the dedication and hard work our team has demonstrated throughout this process.

item.title: 8th Executive Comittee
item.description: We are pleased to introduce the talented individuals who will be leading the Robotics Club Purwanchal Campus, Dharan to new heights.

item.title: Robo Soccer Event in collaboration with SOMES
item.description: Check out these incredible photos from our recent robo soccer event in collaboration with AIMES.

item.title: Robo Race Event in collaboration with X-tech
item.description: It was a thrilling race to the finish line at the X-Tech Robo Race, and we couldn’t be more proud of our victorious team Mechatronics!

item.title: Virtual tour of International Space University in collaboration with NESRA
item.description: We just completed an amazing virtual tour of the International Space University, organized by NESRA Nepalese Space Research Association and co-organized by our Robotics Club - Purwanchal Campus.
